query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.countryId,
  c.name as country_name,
  p.serviceId,
  s.name as service_name,
  s.smshubCode,
  p.apiId,
  a.name as api_name,
  p.ourPrice
FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
ORDER BY p.apiId;
command:

SELECT

  p.countryId,
  c.name as country_name,
  p.serviceId,
  s.name as service_name,
  s.smshubCode,
  p.apiId,
  a.name as api_name,
  p.ourPrice
FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
ORDER BY p.apiId;
